childMarkdownRemark.html: I recently started doing coding challenges to prepare for job interviews. Here's a simple way of finding whether a particular string is a palindrome.
It’s 12:52am and I don’t know what to write about.

node.title: Why I decided to start coding

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is the story of why I decided to start coding. Tl;DR: I started out in Operations, then turned into a Data Analyst and then wanted to become a Product Manager in order to help drive the future of a team. Then that didn't really work out well. And in order to help drive the future of any new team or software product, I decided I'd get in the trenches and write code myself.
